title: 96: One on One with Infectious Disease Specialist Dr. Steve
itunes:title: One on One with Infectious Disease Specialist Dr. Steve
description: On today’s episode, Lisa asks Dr. Steve the questions we’re all thinking: Is it safe to go to the supermarket? What do I do with the groceries when I get home? Is takeout safe? Should I be wearing a mask when I go outside? Can I get the coronavirus after I’ve already had it?  Plus, Lisa asks the million-dollar question: When will this all end? This is a very informative episode of Chew The Right Thing!, so please share it with all your friends. We all need to be safe!
itunes:summary: Lisa goes one on one with friend and infectious disease specialist Dr. Stephen C. Threlkeld on how to stay safe during the coronavirus outbreak.
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
